participant_2.background:
I am the youngest of 3.
I went to college in chicago.
I love playing tennis.
I am pursuing my law degree.
I love reading mysteries in my free time.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! What about you?
I'm doing great, thanks! What do you do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, play video games, and read. What about you?
I like to play tennis, go to the gym, and read mysteries. What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is Nirvana. They're so good! What's your favorite kind of mystery book?
I like psychological thrillers. They're so suspenseful! What do you like about Nirvana?
I love their music. It's so raw and emotional. Do you have a favorite Nirvana song?
I love "All Apologies." It's so beautiful and sad. What's your favorite tennis player?
I love Serena Williams. She's so strong and powerful. What's your favorite kind of tennis?
I like singles tennis. I like the individual challenge. Do you play tennis?
I used to play, but I don't have a lot of time anymore. I miss it. What are you studying for law school?
I'm studying criminal law. I want to be a lawyer someday. What's your job?
I'm a waitress at a local restaurant. It's not my dream job, but it pays the bills. What law school are you going to?
I'm going to the University of Chicago Law School. It's a great school. Do you like your job?
I like it most of the time. It can be stressful, but it's also a lot of fun. I like meeting new people and learning about different cultures. What do you think your future holds?
I hope to be a successful lawyer and make a difference in the world. I think I'm going to make a great lawyer.
